how can I sync my ipod touch with linux: I just want to transfer my music to it
well, it does but requires a newer version of libgpod .. add this line to your sources.list  "deb http://ppa.launchpad.net/ipod-touch/ubuntu gutsy main"  .. and then reinstall gtkpod

So after that...where do I get gpodlib from?
you need to add that line into your /etc/apt/sources.list -- open it like this.   gksudo gedit /etc/apt/sources.list
and then drop this line in at the bottom.  deb http://ppa.launchpad.net/ipod-touch/ubuntu gutsy main
then run this command.  sudo apt-get update; sudo apt-get install gtk-pod
